body:
Hey, I just came up with this cool skin I think it would really bring some style into Xerath. I don't really play Xerath but I noticed that he hasn't received a new skin in around 2 years. Hope you enjoy. 

{{champion:101}} Pool Party Xerath - 1350 RP Cost

Q - Arcanopulse) Prepares to shoot a beam of water from his gun. (At the moment he puts both his arms up to make a ball of energy, instead put a huge water gun on his shoulder that he charges up)

W - Eye Of Destruction) Throws a Water grenade OR When w is activated a float up pool is made at the target location and he throws a rock or something into it making a splash (Inner circle can be indicated by a rubber ducky or yellow pee or something).

E - Shocking Orb) Throws a massive water balloon which pops and explodes with water on impact.

R - Rite Of The Arcane) Kinda the same as W so ye water grenades OR combine q and e together so that he has a water grenade launching gun on his shoulder that he then shoots.

Basic character) Practically all the electricity in his body is replaced with water. 

It's a great time to introduce some new pool party people, hope you like the idea, just a bit weird that I did all this for a champ I don't even play. Maybe the skin would change my mind and many other players as well.

Hope you like the idea.

ZILEANS GOT SWAG{{champion:26}}
